title: Problems Randomly Losing Control of my champion.
body: I am having an issue where I will be playing and I lose control of my character. Its strange because I can see everything else going on as I lose control. I get an attempting to reconnect error as it happens. Its almost as if Im losing the upload connection. It is really frustrating.

replies.body: The issue definitely sounds like a degrading connection with the game server, starting with packet loss that causes these delays until a total disconnect.  You should run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and strengthen your network's communication specifically to the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
